title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, August 28, 2021
description: It is the 50th anniversary of the opening of the restaurant Chez Paisse. Opened by Berkley alum Alice Waters, who has written over a dozen cookbooks.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
